overview.en: In the future, LGCC hopes to create an influential open source community ecosystem through community, third-party developers and technological innovations. The ultimate goal is to integrate the blockchain into the new retail industry and lead the transformation of the retail industry.
overview.zh: LGCC未来希望致力于通过社区、第三方开发者和技术上的创新，打造一个在全球具有影响力的开源社区生态，最终目的是将区块链融入到新零售行业，主导零售业的变革。
